name: dia-skills
title: Dia Skills
description: Import your favorite Dia skills into Raycast, so you can have the freedom to use whatever LLM you want, wherever you want, however you want.
author: Visual-Studio-Coder

commands.name: import-dia-skill
commands.title: Import Dia Skill
commands.description: Input Dia Skill URL and import it to Raycast as an AI command.

arguments.name: skillUrl
arguments.description: The URL of the Dia skill to import

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
